-- 6. Daily sales performance
SELECT 
    CAST(TransactionDate AS DATE) AS SalesDate,
    COUNT(*) AS DailyTransactions,
    SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS DailyRevenue,
    AVG(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS AvgDailyTransaction
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/sales_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS s
GROUP BY CAST(TransactionDate AS DATE)
ORDER BY SalesDate DESC;

-- 7. Payment method analysis
SELECT 
    PaymentMethod,
    COUNT(*) AS TransactionCount,
    SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS TotalAmount,
    AVG(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS AvgTransactionValue
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/sales_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS s
GROUP BY PaymentMethod
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC;

-- 8. Regional performance
SELECT 
    st.Region,
    st.State,
    COUNT(*) AS TransactionCount,
    SUM(s.Quantity * s.UnitPrice - ISNULL(s.Discount, 0)) AS TotalRevenue,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/sales_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS s
JOIN OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/stores.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS st ON s.StoreID = st.StoreID
GROUP BY st.Region, st.State
ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC;
